title: Bulk-to-surface co-modification of layered hydrated vanadate cathode for aqueous zinc ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4090-4103
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00535J, Paper
Chen Zhang, Yan Huang, Xueer Xu, Ziyu Chen, Gang Xiao, Yu Zhong, Xiuli Wang, Changdong Gu, Jiangping Tu
The major challenges of vanadium-based layered materials are their dissolution tendency and the instability of their bulk-phase structure, resulting in unsatisfactory cyclability, particularly at lower current densities.
